channel.title: Bug Finder blog
channel.description: Recent content on Bug Finder blog

item.title: Bitcoin cloud mining "Sharedmining"
item.description: Responsibilities: Creating REST API based on Falcon framework. Creating frontend via Angular 2+. Support site and implement new features. Technologies: Python 3.6 Falcon MySQL Redis Angular 2+

item.title: Processing system "Filesonweb"
item.description: Responsibilities: Creating a new site based on Django 1 (frontend, backend, unit tests, CI) Working with PayPal, Stripe and other processing systems. Technologies: Python 3.5 Django PostgreSQL Redis RabbitMQ Celery

item.title: Facebook game "Dreamlike Mix"
item.description: Responsibilities: Support legacy code and implement new features. Assistance with creating a new core based on Phalcon 1. Technologies: Php5 Phalcon 1 MySQL Redis

item.title: Web based mobile game "Generals"
item.description: Responsibilities: Support legacy code and implement new features. Creating new core via Phalcon 1. Implement CI via Hudson. Technologies: Php5 Phalcon 1 Couchbase Hudson Redis

item.title: First step to Future
item.description: Hello, World! It’s my first post about something. Maybe it’s the last one… But I always glad to see you, my friend, that you find a minute to read this text.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Are you ready to read some boring text?) I was born in Ukraine. For now, live and work in Ukraine also. Fortuity? I had started working on site from school. I was forced to start me on site for the contest, but with time I liked it. That started my history. At university, I was started working on a small company to write a site. It was CTRL+C - CTRL+V job, but I want to bigger.

item.title: My contacts
item.description: Feel free to contact with me via: Skype - godod1 Email - titan074@gmail.com LinkedIn - tap
